Question: In the movie 'The Human Centipede 3 (Final Sequence)' (2015), which of the following statements about the casting choice of Bree Olson are true?
Options:
A. She was cast to represent the ultimate American female.
B. The movie is set in an all-female prison.
C. Bree Olson is a well-known porn actress.
D. The director aimed to include a female character in a male-dominated setting.
Answer: She was cast to represent the ultimate American female., Bree Olson is a well-known porn actress., The director aimed to include a female character in a male-dominated setting.
